Question.Subject: Downloads.nl? what do you sayyy?
Question.Content: Hi, I download a lot of music from downloads.nl. And i was just wondering - my computer has been giving me alot of "Found tracking cookie" threat things - would this be from this website? Also lately my music has been choppy from time to time on itunes =/ and i Do scan my music before putting it on to itunes, and none of my music has any found threats on it. Thanks ! :)
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Tyler, http://www.downloads.nl/ is only one site in http://searchformusic.eu.pn/ (it searches many sites).
Tracking cookies are very common in almost every site, & they are useful, but some antivirus software dislikes them.
